en-US.summary: Learn fun facts from Oscar the Cat
examplePhrases: Alexa open oscar the cat facts
Alexa ask oscar the cat facts for a cat fact
Alexa tell oscar the cat facts to give me a cat fact
en-US.name: Oscar the Cat Facts
en-US.description:
Ask Oscar for a Cat Fact, and learn about what really matters to a cat, like cat treats.

Oscar the Cat Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, ask Oscar the Cat about Cat facts" or "Alexa, open Oscar the Cat Facts" to get a cat fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
